name: Karma Wind
simple_desc: Attacks the enemy. After entering combat, consumes own HP and deals Wind DMG to all enemies.
desc:
Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering combat, consumes #2[i]% of Blade's Max HP while dealing Wind DMG equal to #1[i]% of his Max HP to all enemies.
If Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when this Technique is used.
